@GrozoursVaniteux

Download 
http://www.videolan.org 
http://www.free-codecs.com/download/kmplayer.htm 

(My fav is Media Player Classic - Home Cinema but above two is good for Any general user!)

For KMPlayer and PotPlayer Users.
When switching AAC audio tracks, sometimes SKIW playback speed issues occur. (In any MKV with multi AAC streams).
To avoid it use Morgan Switcher.
("Options → Preferences → Filter Control → Multi-Audio Streams" and select "Morgan Stream Switcher". Or "System Default" may also work)
